description: Configuration for visual particle effects, such as smoke, fire, exhaust, etc.

propertyNames.description: Effect names must be a sequence of basic alphanumeric characters without a space.

effectFile.description: The gestalt id of the .emitter file for this particle effect.

tex.description: The gestalt id of the particle texture for this effect.

tint.description: A keyword of a color defined in colorsConfig or in GameColors.java. Must be any sequence of basic alphanumeric characters without a space.

floatsUp.description: True if particles will float opposing the gravity of the nearest planet, default false.

size.description: The default unit size of each individual particle. Almost always overwritten for special effects.
